author: prbuzz.com
title: Introducing a campaing for: The World's Best Laptop Stand
text:
A SEXY PORTABLE LAPTOP AND SMARTPHONE STAND
Anybody who's made a run to Office Depot lately knows that there are aisles full of portable laptop stands. And as far as we've seen, they're all hideous. We took one look at the Apex Stand and knew these cats were onto something. Note the smartphone holder.
Link: http://bit.ly/Sano1
Picture 1: https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/004/297/156/33dbd9a6649731da5e0b96c6a9e1a1c5_original.gif?v=1439288735&w=680&fit=max&q=92&s=015dd54619b22d4815dfa54d2764c83d
Picture 2: https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/004/303/345/160e2c083a021d7d781ea2e1559b68da_original.jpg?v=1439368636&w=680&fit=max&auto=format&q=92&s=ab4f2552b4d2c5ffa7f4061fa2af4bb0
